findings.title: Unrestricted Self-Destruct
findings.explanation: The function sudicideAnyone is publicly callable and executes selfdestruct on msg.sender without any access control. This allows any user to destroy the contract and withdraw its funds.
findings.fix_suggestion: Restrict access to the selfdestruct function, for example by adding an onlyOwner modifier from OpenZeppelin's Ownable contract or implementing a custom access control mechanism.
